ComicInfo.Summary:
Mental Patient
A man unknowingly takes the place of an escaped mental patient on a bus headed to an asylum. Now he must prove to the doctors that he doesn't belong there. But how do you know you're not insane when everyone keeps telling you you're crazy?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Daniel Leister & Sean Ellery | 1 | B | Cover B | Antonio Bifulco & Vinicius Andrade | 8 | C | Cover C | Alfredo Reyes & Ylenia Di Napoli | 9 | D | New York Comic Con Cosplay Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 250 | Sabine Rich | 5 | E | New York Comic Con Cosplay Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 75 | Sabine Rich | 3 | F | ComicTraders.ca Edmonton Comic & Entertainment Expo Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 500 | Jamie Tyndall (a) & Ula Mos (c) | 7 | G | New York Comic Con Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 500 | Paul Green (a) & Ula Mos (c) | 4 | H | New York Comic Con Exclusive ZenBox Variant Cover, Limited to 150 | Paul Green & Ula Mos | 2 | I | New York Comic Con Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 100 | Paul Green & Ula Mos | 6 |
